Artifact_Selene.name: CONSTRUCTOR DRONE
Artifact_Selene.description: An invicible constructor drone follows you around, moving along with <c=midrow>midrow</c>.

Artifact_SeleneV2.name: ARMS RACE
Artifact_SeleneV2.description: Mount a cannon onto the <c=E77FDB>CONSTRUCTOR DRONE</c>, shooting for 1 damage every time you attack. Beware of friendly fire!

Artifact_Delivery.name: FRESH DELIVERY
Artifact_Delivery.description: At combat start, add 1 random attach card to your hand with temp, discount, single use and retain.

Artifact_CheapRandom.name: CHEAP PARTS
Artifact_CheapRandom.description: Attach cards cost 1 less. Random droneshift 3 before every attach.

AttachPart.name: ATTACH PART
AttachPart.description: Attach a part to your ship at the <c=E77FDB>CONSTRUCTOR DRONE</c>'s location.

RecyclePart.name: RECYCLE PART
RecyclePart.description: Destroy a TEMP part at the <c=E77FDB>CONSTRUCTOR DRONE</c>'s location.
RecyclePart.condition: the <c=E77FDB>CONSTRUCTOR DRONE</c> is aligned with a TEMP part

WeldPart.name: WELD PART
WeldPart.description: Modify a part at the <c=E77FDB>CONSTRUCTOR DRONE's</c> location.

Align.name: ALIGN
Align.description: Bring the <c=E77FDB>CONSTRUCTOR DRONE</c> to the center of your ship.

Eject.name: EJECT LEFTMOST
Eject.description: Eject your leftmost <c=part>temporary</c> part for {0} damage.
Eject.descriptionF: Eject your rightmost <c=part>temporary</c> part for {0} damage.

MagPull.name: PULL MIDROW
MagPull.description: PULL all <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> toward your ship.

MagPush.name: PUSH MIDROW
MagPush.description: PUSH all <c=midrow>midrow objects</c> away from your ship.

Reinforce.name: REINFORCED
Reinforce.description: The next time a part should be destroyed because of <c=part>single use</c>, it isn't.

Plating.name: PLATING
Plating.description: The next time a part should be destroyed because of <c=part>breakable</c>, it isn't.

SingleUse.name: SINGLE USE
SingleUse.description: This part is destroyed after activating once.

Breakable.name: BREAKABLE
Breakable.description: This part is destroyed after being hit.

Temp.name: TEMPORARY
Temp.description: This part is removed after combat.

Scaffolding.name: WEAK SCAFFOLDING
Scaffolding.description: This part is destroyed when you move.

Shield.name: SHIELD
Shield.description: This and adjacent parts take 1 less damage from attacks.

ShieldV2.name: SHIELD V2
ShieldV2.description: This and adjacent parts take 2 less damage from attacks.

Cloak.name: CLOAKING
Cloak.description: On turn start, create 1 <c=card>Activate Cloaking</c> in hand if you don't already have one.

ThrusterRight.name: THRUSTER
ThrusterRight.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 1 spaces to the left.

ThrusterV2Right.name: THRUSTER V2
ThrusterV2Right.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 2 spaces to the left.

ThrusterLeft.name: THRUSTER
ThrusterLeft.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 1 space to the right.

ThrusterV2Left.name: THRUSTER V2
ThrusterV2Left.description: On turn end, pushes the ship 2 spaces to the right.

Bubble.name: BUBBLE BAY
Bubble.description: Whenever a <c=midrow>midrow object</c> passes in front of this, it gets bubbled.

Dynamo.name: DYNAMO CANNON
Dynamo.description: Whenever this part moves, it attacks for 1 dmg.

Reactor.name: ENERGY REACTOR
Reactor.description:
At turn start, gain 1 energy.
<c=downside>Explodes when destroyed, damaging adjacent parts for 1</c>.

Launcher.name: MISSILE LAUNCHER
Launcher.descriptionA: At turn start, launch a <c=midrow>heavy missile</c>.

Selene.name: Selene
Selene.description:
<c=E77FDB>SELENE</c>
A ship builder. Her cards modify your ship on the fly.

ActivateCloak.name: Activate Cloaking
ActivateCloak.description: <c=part>cloaking device</c> and adjacent parts become <c=part>empty</c> until next turn.
ActivateCloak.descriptionB: Your entire ship becomes <c=part>empty</c> until next turn.

Magnetize.name: Magnetize
Magnetize.push: PUSH <c=midrow>all midrow objects</c> away from your ship.
Magnetize.pull: PULL <c=midrow>all midrow objects</c> toward your ship.

Shuffle.name: Shuffle!
Shuffle.description: Shuffle your ship and gain 2 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

EjectAll.name: Disassembly
EjectAll.description: Eject all your <c=part>temporary</c> parts, dealing {0} damage per hit.

Weld.name: Weld
Weld.description: Remove <c=part>single use</c> and <c=part>breakable</c> from a part.
Weld.descriptionA: Remove <c=part>temporary</c> and <c=part>single use</c> from a part.
Weld.descriptionB: Remove <c=part>temporary</c>, <c=part>single use</c>, and <c=part>breakable</c> from a part.
